content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Hello Mister Heine, thank you for inviting me to see the apartment. Based on my research and personal preferences, I am willing to negotiate a rental price for the apartment. What is your initial rental price?
name: Bo Li

content: My initial rental price is 800 Euros per month. I'm open to discussing lower prices if necessary. What is your counter offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My counter offer would be a rental price of 750 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price based on the size and location of the apartment. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Bo Li

content:
Yes, I accept this price. We can agree on 750 Euros per month. Thank you for your flexibility.
I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for accepting my counter offer of 750 Euros per month. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Bo Li
